name: Angry Bulls
description:
Angry Bulls is a racing & action game that it is easy to control has thrill sense and has been getting hi-ranking and craze in players all over the world.The fun and anger effects added in the game play where Bull is Angry and out of control with having full of anger, avoid the obstacles such as horrible small fence and hell rings and to get gold and item by controlling rapidly the hi-speedy running was crazy to low down his anger by hitting animals come in his way, makes users have a good fun.
The most famous running of the bulls is the eight-day bull run festival of Sanfermines in honour of Saint Fermin in Pamplona although they are also traditionally held in other places such as towns and villages across Spain, Portugal, in some cities in Mexico and southern France during the summer.
The origin of this event comes from the need to transport the bulls from the fields outside the city, where they were bred, to the bullring, where they would be killed in the evening. In Pamplona and other places, the six bulls in the event are still those that will feature in the afternoon bullfight of the same day.

Game Features:
- Exquisitely rendered 3D visuals
- A huge free-roaming world to explore in Endless mode
- Fluid, graceful and exhilarating physics-based game-play
